title: Terrydactyland
description: This is where the real fun begins. The first level with heaps of clockwork shots and warps.

general.name: Fall to Chompasaurus
general.description: A well-placed jump from the upper area inside the mountain will land you on top of Chompa's pillar.

general.name: Slope Climb To Springy Step Silo
general.description: Banjo can quickly reach Jamjars' silo to learn Springy Step Shoes by abusing the slope timer near the entrance to TDL.

general.name: Styracosaurus Slope Climb as Mumbo
general.description: Mumbo can reach the Styracosaurus Cave via the ramp by abusing the slope timer.

general.name: Crouch Falls
general.description: As solo Kazooie, you can run and crouch-slide to avoid taking fall damage from high areas.

general.name: Stomping Plains as BK
general.description: How to cross Stomping Plains as BK.

general.name: Stomping Plains as Solo Kazooie (Includes Clockwork Shot)
general.description: How to cross Stomping Plains as solo Kazooie and collect the jiggy.

general.name: How to Fight/2-Cycle Terry
general.description: Optimal movement for defeating Terry in only two cycles.

cwkshots.name: Roar Cage Shot
cwkshots.description: You can avoid collecting the roar cage jiggy as baby T-rex by shooting a clockwork egg through a gap around it.

cwkshots.name: Roar Cage Shot (Alternate Method)
cwkshots.description: An alternate method to collect the roar cage jiggy with a clockwork.

cwkshots.name: Daddy T-Rex Cage Shot
cwkshots.description: Collect the jinjo with a clockwork egg instead of activating the switch with daddy T-rex.

cwkshots.name: Inside the Mountain Cheato Page Shot
cwkshots.description: How to collect the cheato page inside the mountain with a clockwork.

cwkshots.name: Dippy's Cheato Page Shot
cwkshots.description: Dippy's Cheato page can be collected without filling his water by shooting a clockwork egg.

cwkshots.name: Stomping Plains as Solo Kazooie (Clockwork Shot)
cwkshots.description: How to collect the Stomping Plains jiggy as solo Kazooie with a clockwork egg.

cwkwarps.name: TDL Early
cwkwarps.description: In Unga Bungas' Cave, Banjo takes damage from an enemy at the same time a clockwork enters the loading zone to TDL, warping Banjo to the other side of the loading zone.

cwkwarps.name: Chompasaurus Warp
cwkwarps.description: Walking a clockwork through the loading zone to Terry's nest while damaging it with a grenade egg will warp Banjo through the loading zone to the other side.

cwkwarps.name: Oogle Boogle Early
cwkwarps.description: While pooping a grenade egg into the loading zone area, shoot a clockwork egg into the grenade's hitbox as it explodes to warp Banjo into Oogle Boogles' Cave.
